"Stop her!":
"You caused us so much trouble!
But now it's time we stopped messing
around!"

"I was told they wanted her dead or
alive! Kill her!"
"I may look sweet, but I have knowledge."
"Tch, they're still royalty, even if they're rotten."

"But whom underestimates whom goes
both ways, princess!"

"A summon!?
To think a Magician was after me!?"
"（To think, this is where I fall.）"

"No matter, if you insist on
interfering. I'll end you both,
right here!"

"You still plan on using
Ephimera...! Careful, enemies
are coming!"

"Boy, this never gets tiring!
This thing is truly amazing!"

"Summoned beasts!
Kill those cheeky arrogant fools quickly!"

"Now that's become like this,
there's no other way but to destroy
those enemies. Can I count on your
assistance?"
